content:
TOWNHOUSE TO SHARE -- FURNISHED -- Sandy Springs

Hi There,
I am a SF and seek SF only!
I have an Extra Nice 3 story Townhouse to Share
.
The room available is an Extra Large Furnished Bedroom, 15x16.
Extra Large Walk-in Closet, your own Master Bath.
Triple Dresser, Desk, Bed, Loveseat, 32" TV.

Easy access to 285 & 400.... on local Bus Routes to downtown, and train....... Come live in an exclusive area of town, with a great community.
The Community is small and safe. Excellent for a woman renter. So, Ladies Call!
All this for the right person. Long Term!

All Utilities (Gas, Elec., Water, Trash, Insurance) are furnished, includes 32" TV, DishTV Service, Phone, Long Distance.
Internet Service is at your own expense.

You Must be Clean, Share House Responsibilities, Be An Animal Lover. (I have really sweet cats, very social, extra clean, you will not smell a kitty box)... . . No additional pets please.

You Must be someone that is a smoker, or has no trouble with a smoker. I smoke outside, and in my room.
No Drugs -- No Couples

Some other features are: Newly Renovated Buildings, 24' High Ceilings in Living Area, Fireplace, Large Deck, Private Balcony Overlooking a Beautiful Arboretum, Tennis (players will love these courts), Pool, Laundry on site, Brand New Work-Out Center.

The rent is $700.00, and requires a deposit of $300.00, $200.00 refundable.
(This rent has been reduced by a savings of over $70.00 per month)

I am open to discussing, and coordinating time with a serious Female who is stable in her job, and can meet the rental requirements. Serious inquiries only.
Will not Last!
Term: 1 year
Application Fee ( $10.00)
The space is available April 1st.
References and rental history required.
Please Read All of Ad!!!!

You may call me, if unavailable, please leave a message WITH YOUR NAME AND NUMBER (NO TEXTS).
Call show contact info
Weekday appointments only.

Spacious room ready for move in (Furnished Apartment)


It's a 2 bedroom 2 bath so we will have our own room and bathroom in Decatur.
It's a really nice place- new appliances, new carpet, and nice location.
The apartment is fully furnished. There are tons of restaurants and bars nearby.
I am looking for someone who is either a student or a professional.
It doesn't matter if you smoke as long as it's outside.
You must have a job, no criminal background. I'm a working professional.
I enjoy going out with friends and do the normal stuff.
I don't smoke or do drugs and I have a clean background. No pets.
Rent is $390 per month. No Security Deposit is required.


If you are interested, please text here:- show contact info (anytime)


Thank you!!

Bedroom w/shared bath/in a nice neighborhood

Large one bedroom with shared bath available for rent in a nice neighborhood.
Fully fenced in yard, lower yard/landscape area with hot tub large garage/man cave
With separate wood shop room. We have 2 dogs (one small, one large)
And unfortunately cannot have any more. The available room is the medium sized,
One (about 10 x 13). The landlords operate through a homeowners association
And will want to do a credit check. this should only be a problem
If you have really bad credit or standing collections.
Rent is $360 per month with everything included.

------------------

Master bedroom w/ private bathroom in Midtown!

The unit has parking and a washing and dryer. You would share the house
With a 30 year old female who just graduated law school. She wants females only.
It is 400$ a month plus half utilities, which are usually only about $25 per month.
The room is unfurnished however I'd be opening to selling my furniture,
Which I just bought in January 2016. The room is available now.
There is a 200$ deposit and Credit check required.

400 Winchester at Vinings Apartment Homes for rent offer a picturesque community environment that features spacious one, two, and three bedroom garden-style homes. Surrounded by large oaks, tree lined sidewalks, and open green space, our apartment homes combine a small town charm with the heart of the big city. 400 Winchester is conveniently located just moments away from the heart of Vinings and the various dining and shopping destinations that contribute to the city's invigorating nightlife. Select newly renovated units include stainless steel appliances, new flooring, and updated countertops. Community amenities include a state of the art fitness center, renovated clubhouse and business center, laundry facilities and laundry hook-ups in select units and a fenced in leash-free dog park. 400 Winchester is a pet friendly community, welcoming both cats and dogs with only a few breed restrictions.

-Refrigerator
-Package Receiving
-Heat
-Pool
-Range
-Accent Walls
-Pets Allowed
-Freeway Access

Call show contact info

The private suite has four rooms, a bedroom, living room, study, and full bath.
Please note that while the suite has a half bath your private shower.
The kitchen on the 1st floor is shared with a quiet, responsible female professional.
Spacious rooms with lots of natural light, Furnished and with all kitchen utensils.
AC in upstairs bedroom and in all of downstairs; your own mini-fridge upstairs;
Dishwasher; sauna, washer/dryer in lower level; yard; access to garage for bike storage.
No pets, no smoking On-street parking only.
Rent is $390 per month with all utilities inclued!!!!!!!!

I have a room available in a 2bd/2 bath luxury 1100 sqf condo located in downtown Atlanta.
This is a great location for GSU or GA Tech students.

The room is medium sized ( about 200 sqf) with high ceiling, available for rent with private bathroom, slide door closet,washer/dryer in unit, hardwood floors, shared kitchen & living room area with a large external balcony.

Building Facility Includes:
-Concierge Service (Fob Entry Only)
-Swimming Pool
-Workout Facility
-Club House (with full kitchen)

We are located 5 mins. driving distance from Krog Street Market, 5 mins from Ponce City Market, 5 mins. from Piedmont Park, 5 mins. from the awesome belt line & 2mins away from the 75 freeway which connects you to all major highways. Gas stations, grocery stores and anything you need is close to home.

Utilities included in rent are:: trash fees, wifi, cable, gas & water bill. The electric bill is not included but bill is usually low and will be split. Parking is not included but plenty of street parking is available. I'm looking for a reliable, responsible, respectful, non-smoking FEMALE roommate. The ideal roommate would be between 25-32yrs old, clean, organized, considerate & friendly with a great positive personality.


*Serious inquiries only and please send a picture of yourself when responding
Note:: Sorry no pets & NO smokers

I am a female working professional, looking for a female roommate to share a 3 BR/ 2BA condo in Buckhead. It is in a safe a quiet community in the Brookwood area of South Buckhead. The condo is located near the beltline and just off of Peachtree Road. Easy access to Midtown, Buckhead, I-75, I-85, and Downtown, walking distance to grocery stores, bars and restaurants.

The dining room, living room and kitchen are furnished, but the bedroom is not furnished. You will have your own private/large bathroom and share it with guests, who are rarely around. The 3rd bedroom is not going to be rented but used as a room for guests. Rent includes in-unit washer/dryer, community pool, back porch, balcony, parking space. No Smoking or Pets allowed. Water and trash is included in rent. Electricity & Internet (monthly estimate of $100) will be split in half and due at end of month.

$700/month + $350 security deposit REQUIRED to move in.

There will be an application and background check. Lease terms are negotiable. Open to short and long term lease.

Available from May 1st, 2016. Earlier move-in date is possible

Pets free house...looking for mature professionals... Serious inquires only please...@ 573-529-186nine...can provide more picture if needed. Thanks for your interest.

The house is an end-of-row house, it has much natural light in all parts of house.
It's really close to the park, hospital, shopping center, bus stop, rail service.
Rent is $400 plus utilities for the room with big closet and its own linen closet.
There are two full bathrooms in the house, one on 2nd floor and one on 3rd floor,
So you will only have to share the bath room with one other person.
We're looking for a clean, laid back, responsible 22+ years old roommate.
Unfortunately, there are no pets allowed in the house. No smoking please.
Would like to make an appointment, please text :=

Hi,
I'm a 52/yo Sbm , I have a 3br 2.5 townhouse off of Camp Creek Pkway, 3 minutes from the market place. One of the bedrooms is furnished the other is not. The apt is on a Marta line.

I'm an entrepreneur and I need an assistant. There is one young lady living with me who's also helping me out, she is 24y/o she has a job, in college, no kids and a social life , so her help is limited that's why I need another person.

You, be female , nonsmoker, (420 is ok) as long as it's in your room, be computer literate , I actually need you to do what you probably do anyway and that's Social Media Marketing, FB, Twitter, Instagram , etc


This may be a deal breaker but absolutely no male visitors. I'm gone a lot and I really don't want any men sitting around my house enjoying what I've worked for. I don't care if you have your girlfriend over.

This is not a full-time job, it's more of help me out when I need it. This would be ideal for a college student , gay or bi female, (that way the , no men thing wouldn't be a problem)

The rent is 380 if you don't want to be a part-time assistant, it's $250 a month if you opt for the assistant. The apt is on a Marta line. You will have your own bathroom.

If you are not working then we can discuss other arrangements like being a full-time assistant/housekeeper for free rent until you get on your feet.

I'm looking for females only. The other thing is, this is not a "hook up " ad, this is a serious and legit offer.

Please send a recent photo when you contact me, the reason is this. I've had conversations with "women" and come to an agreement only to find out they were men who consider themselves women ( this is Atlanta) and I've also had conversations with real women only to see them and they've got a bone going through their nose or a hundred piercings in their face. To each his own but none of the above scenarios is something I want to look at every day. I'm just trying to find a normal , stable , drama free person to help me out and share a space with, that's all.

P.S.
If you've seen this ad on here before and wonder why it keeps coming back up. I will tell you, it's because I'm very serious in my offer and what I keep running into is people who think I'm some feeble old man that they're going to take advantage of and when they find out that's not the case then they have a problem with moving in, or they try to change my mind about smoking cigarettes or their "friend" coming over.

The ad is straightforward, if you don't like the terms please just don't respond. I'm not changing my mind about the rules of the house. I don't need a roommate , I need an assistant, but I realize that this arrangement can benefit me and another serious person.
thank you.

room for rent I have a 3bd home off flat shoals behind Walmart on old national. I have 1 room available the other rooms are occupied and the bathroom & kitchen you would share with the other tenants. room is $450 a month give me a call or text

Hi, I'm a handsome young professional SBM male that works full-time and in school. I also have a single Hispanic female living here that works full time. We are looking for 1 female roommate age range 19-35( open to any race. We are single busy individuals that like to watch movies, workout, travel, dine out, and we like are wine too. Looking for someone with similar interests.

I would like to know:
Alittle bit about yourself and why you think we would be great roomies?

You will have your own:
1. Nice full size bed with new sheets.
2. 1bed & Bath

The Apartment is a 2 bed 2 bath apt 1200 SQ FT, fireplace, and lake view patio in Sandy Springs GA. If you have a FULLTIME JOB, nice,single fun - outgoing, spontaneous, non smoker, mobile is preferred, no kids, don't mind helping cleaning, drug free, this opportunity is just for you. Criminal background check may be implemented. It comes with a Washer and Dryer, Utilities cable and internet is included. (Note: Must participate in cleaning common areas.)

Feel free to send me a e m a i l if you are interested. j ray ray 1 at g m i l .

A UNIQUE MASTER BR LAYOUT.

Preferred roommate would be working professional or MA student NON SMOKING female +25 years old but willing to make certain exceptions for a male roommate based on references.
S/he will also be asked to submit application to leasing office.
THERE IS AN APPLICATION FEE OF $99, sorry no exceptions according to the leasing office.
Deposit NOT required.
Bedroom Rental is a non standard 13 month lease. Email and ask for details.
MOVE IN DATE May 1.
The current lease ends on May 17 so first month's rent will be pro-rated.
THIS IS NOT A SUB LEASE, YOU WILL BE ON THE ORIGINAL LEASE.

The rent is $781 + average utilities + cable internet $50= $831.
LARGE ENOUGH TO FIT EITHER QUEEN OR KING SIZE BED. One possible layout spaciously fits a Queen bed, side table, chaise lounge, dresser, 40" Flat Screen, bookcase and lamp.

The BR is 15' 8" x 13' and BA 8'x8'10" in a 1200 sq ft 2 BR 2 BA apt.
The Walk In Closet is approx. 8'L x 3.5'W x 11'H.

The apartment complex is called 17 West and the link is here. 17westapts.com/
Following amenities:
- Evening Private Security personnel
- Elevator Access from Parking Deck & for Move-In
- Covered Parking Deck (Free Parking including guests)
- Car Wash with Vacuum
- Pool with Grill & Waterfall
** Newly renovated and extended gym: Class room for free zumba, yoga, circuit training classes, weight room and cardio room.
- Pet Stations & Events
- Media Room incl. Free Wifi
- Extra Storage Space

IT'S ALL ABOUT LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION.
Right off I-85 S Exit 17th St., 5.5 mile before the start of 400, in Between I-75 & I-85.
Next to Target on 18th St.
Across from IKEA.
2 min. walk to Atlantic Station: featuring two banks BB&T & Wells Fargo, L.A. Fitness, Publix grocery store, restaurants (Yardhouse, Chick-a-Biddy, Meehans, etc.), Dillard's, shops and boutiques, Regal movie theatre and event exhibits (Bodies, Cirque Du Soleil).
Free shuttle to Midtown 16th St. Arts Center Marta Station

**IF you were to apply for a 1 BR 1BA it is approx. $1100-$1200 market price, you are SAVING $300-400 by renting with me! :)
For some reasons all the photos have been resized after posting. All rooms are much wider than they appear!
The bedroom photo has a full size platform bed.

The apartment rents for $990 a month so the rent split down the middle would be $495. The rent is open for discussion depending on who has the master bedroom. You must apply for the apartment through the leasing office. I'm looking to move in on May 1st.

I'm 29 years old. A college graduate and fully employed. I'm barely home because I work long hours on film sets. I'm looking for someone cool who I could possibly be friends with too.

Call or text show contact info
I'm a female looking to rent a room ASAP in N. Gwinnett area close to Athens. Prefers a single household with no indoor pets due to allergies. Looking to pay around $400 per month + utilities.

Room available in a 4 BR 2 BA home in Candler Park. Large bedroom with large closet, open living/dining rooms, full kitchen with all appliances including dishwasher, hardwoods and ceiling fans throughout, tiled bathroom, lots of windows and natural light, shared covered front porch and screened in back deck, shared washer and dryer in house, new central heat and air systems, on street parking only, but plenty available.

Fantastic location immediately adjacent to a locally run park and community gardens, walking distance to local shops and restaurants, convenient to MARTA and bike lanes, less than 2 miles to Decatur Square / Agnes Scott, less than 3 miles to Emory / CDC / Downtown / GSU / Georgia Tech.

Current roommates are co-ed professionals, mid 20's-mid 30's, 1 male, two females.

Rent is $500/month plus a per person share of household utilities (~$75). $500 refundable deposit due at move in.

One indoor cat on premises.

Available May 7th, 2016

Seeking roommate to rent condo share house w/ roommate private 1br w/1.5 ba.

Interested to rent... 2br 1.5 bedroom Condo in Smyrna with easy going like minded individual. Id like to find a roommate to share a very nice and newly refinished condo located near Market Village. Rent $1100 months split with half utilities. I'd say monthly expenses for the unit should run about $700 per person as I'd ideally like to keep rent under $800 monthly. Expecting to move in May but no later than June,1st.

I can offer pictures and details of the place for rent with serious inquires. Please send me a little info about yourself and expected move date.

About me, I'm a 36 y/o female with a career in veterinary medicine working 40+ hrs mostly nights. I have 2 older spayed/declawed "dog friendly" chill cats who don't mind keeping to smaller quarters. I'm not perfect... although, I do have ritual cleaning days, keep a tidy house, and clean up after my pets and myself if an accident should happen. During the week, I like to come home keep mostly to myself... Netflix, read, listen to music or maybe cook. I'm way past the party days although, I do enjoy nature hikes w/ my camera, good brews or glass of wine a cpl times a week and get out to concerts when time allows.

Currently, I share a townhouse in Smyrna w/ a friend that works daytime hours but soon to get married. I have nice bedroom and living room furnishings that I would like to use in the home if possible but welcome your style too. Therefore, seek a roommate or similar shared living situation. Where we can be respectable friends, occasionally have dinner or drinks together depending time/mood, yet polity have guests at our home.

Please feel free to email if you think I am a good fit to join you or you would be interested to talk more about going in on our new home.

Thanks,
Stephanie

Txt or email.
